pr_title: Add query modifier for checking acting player info

timeline.author: Pablete1234

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change *

If the modified query returns null the query will abstain. *

If the modified query returns {@code null} this modifier will abstain without querying the child filter. A query can't abstain, unsure about the phrasing.
